dependencies.description:
GCJ requires the Eclipse Java parser, but does not ship with it. This
builds that parser into an executable binary, thereby making GCJ work.
dependencies.name: eclipse-gcj-parser

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

description:
PDFtk Server is a command-line tool for working with PDFs. It is
commonly used for client-side scripting or server-side processing of
PDFs.
name: pdftk

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
